organisation_name: Instituto Español del Cemento y sus Aplicaciones (IECA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Spanish Institute of Cement and its Applications is a private technical institute dedicated to the study, assessment and promotion of knowledge and technologies in the field of cement and related products: concrete and mortars.
